AND CONFIG_SEQ = #configSeq#
USE_YN = #useYn#

SELECT * FROM I_SCHEDULE_CONFIG WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ= #seq#
USE_YN = #useYn#
sqlMap.procedure: DECLARE I_COUNT NUMBER; I_SEQ VARCHAR2(10) := #seq#; BEGIN SELECT COUNT(SEQ) INTO I_COUNT FROM I_SCHEDULE_CONFIG WHERE SEQ = I_SEQ; BEGIN IF I_COUNT <> 0 THEN UPDATE I_SCHEDULE_CONFIG SET USE_YN = #useYn#, TITLE = #title#, NEW_DAY = #newDay#, PRINT_YN = #printYn#, DEL_YN = #delYn#, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE SEQ = I_SEQ; ELSE INSERT INTO I_SCHEDULE_CONFIG ( SEQ, USE_YN, TITLE, REG_ID, REG_NAME, REG_IP, NEW_DAY, PRINT_YN, DEL_YN ) VALUES( I_SEQ, #useYn#, #title#, #regId#, #regName#, #regIp#, #newDay#, #printYn#, #delYn# ); END IF; END; END;
